Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
one-woman \one-woman\ adj. Designed for or restricted to a single person; same as {one-man}, but used when the person in question is female, or to avoid sexist language; as, a one-woman submarine; a one-woman show.
Syn: one-man, one-person. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
one-man adj : designed for or restricted to a single person; "a one-man show"; "a one-person tent" [syn: {one-man(a)}, {one-person(a)}, {one-woman(a)}]
